r.d: Memcached is a caching daemon designed especially for dynamic web applications to decrease database load by storing objects in memory. This extension allows you to work with memcached through handy OO and procedural interfaces.
r.n: - Fix Bug #63142 - memcache client Segmentation fault - Fix Bug #63272 - Explicitly reserve range of flags in php_memcache.h so application code can use - Fix Bug #59602 - getExtendedStats fails on the host intermittently after restarting memcache - Fix Bug #63141 - Added LICENSE file and include tests folder in package
